inp.user_instructions: Generate a completion note for the task {Task Description} finished by {Task Owner} on {Date Completed}
Create an automatic comment stating that {Assigned User} was assigned to work on {Task Description} by {Created By}
Compose an email to {Client Name} to follow up on the order {Order ID} delivery status
Create a ticket assigned to {Technician} with issue description {Issue Description} opened by customer {Customer Name}
Draft first section of operations manual for new process {Process Title}
Compose memo to {Manager Name} recommending general ideas to improve {Department Function}
Create a help desk ticket for {User} who's having issues with {Software}
Generate an email to {Customer Name} based on: {Issue Description} and {Resolution Details}

placeholders_mapping.Resolution Details: Your password has been reset. You can now log in with your new password.

inp.user_instructions: Analyze the following meeting notes and generate a list of actionable items: {Meeting Notes}

placeholders_mapping.Meeting Notes:
Topic: Project X Launch Timeline
Date: 2023-12-20
Attendees: John Smith, Jane Doe, Bob Johnson
Discussion:
- Reviewed current deadlines for each project milestone.
- Identified potential delays due to resource constraints.
- Brainstormed solutions to mitigate delays and maintain launch date.
Decisions:
- Prioritize development of core features for initial launch.
- Allocate additional resources to critical tasks.
- Investigate outsourcing non-essential tasks.

inp.user_instructions: Generate a project plan with milestones and deadlines based on the information in the '{Goals}', '{Requirements}', and '{Project Duration}' columns. Assume an {Estimated Timeframe} for completion.

placeholders_mapping.Goals: Improve user experience, increase conversion rates
placeholders_mapping.Requirements: Responsive design, updated content, streamlined checkout process
